message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  However, I can't go lower than $17,000. This product offers significant long-term benefits, which justifies the price.
I understand your perspective on the long-term benefits, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $14,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $15,500. Can you consider that?
